message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I understand you want a larger share, but let's be reasonable. This offer accounts for the time value of money.
You didn't want 60-40, now it's 65-35. The longer we wait, the less you'll get.
This is my final offer. A 50/50 split is the fairest option.  If we continue, the value decreases for both of us.
You should have taken 60-40 when you had the chance. Now it's 70-30. Time is on my side.
